1. What is the relationship between tobacco use and physical activity 


```{r}
tobacco_data <- new_youth_risk_df %>% 
  # filter(LocationAbbr == "ME") %>% 
  # select("YEAR", "Topic", "Subtopic", "ShortQuestionText", "Greater_Risk_Data_Value", "Lesser_Risk_Data_Value", "Sample_Size", "Sex", "Race", "Grade", "SexualIdentity", "SexOfSexualContacts") %>% 
  filter(Topic %in% c("Tobacco Use", "Physical Activity")) %>% 
  group_by(ShortQuestionText) %>%
  summarise(count = sum(Sample_Size), Sample_Size, Greater_Risk_Data_Value, Lesser_Risk_Data_Value, Race, SexualIdentity, Topic)
  mutate(total_count = count * Sample_Size)
```
```{r}
tobacco_data <- new_youth_risk_df %>% 
  # filter(LocationAbbr == "ME") %>% 
  # select("YEAR", "Topic", "Subtopic", "ShortQuestionText", "Greater_Risk_Data_Value", "Lesser_Risk_Data_Value", "Sample_Size", "Sex", "Race", "Grade", "SexualIdentity", "SexOfSexualContacts") %>% 
  filter(Topic %in% c("Tobacco Use")) %>% 
  group_by(ShortQuestionText) %>%
  summarise(count = sum(Sample_Size), Sample_Size, Greater_Risk_Data_Value, Lesser_Risk_Data_Value, Race, SexualIdentity, Topic, Grade) +
  #mutate(total_count = count * Sample_Size) +
  filter(Grade != "Total")
```

```{r}
tobacco_data %>%
  ggplot(aes(y = Topic, x = count)) +
  geom_col(ledgend = NULL)
```

```{r}
tobacco_data %>%
  filter(Grade != "Total") %>%
  mutate(Grade = as.factor(Grade)) %>%
  mutate(Grade = fct_relevel(Grade, "9th")) %>%
  group_by(Grade, ShortQuestionText) %>%
  summarise(mean = mean(Greater_Risk_Data_Value, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(y = ShortQuestionText, x = mean, fill = Grade)) +
  geom_col(ledgend = NULL, position = "dodge") +
  scale_color_viridis_b()
  
```
